column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ At 8:40 pm on February 18
column5: the Ministry of Interior’s Ministry of Interior’s Anti-Human Trafficking and Juvenile Protection Department cooperated with the Steung Meanchey III Police Department to raid Barbecue 999
column6: on suspicion the business offered sexual services.------Five young girls and two shop owners were taken for questioning. The property is along Borey Sonny Street
column10: they were sent to the Ministry of Interior’s Anti-Human Trafficking and Juvenile Protection Division for legal action.------POST NEWS
